channel.title: [508]How i get an item working[508]
channel.description:
I have some items that dont work.
like:
Bunny ears Scythe
How can i wear them? or fix them to wear

item.title: [508]How i get an item working[508]
item.dc:creator: @Meryntje Meryntje
item.description:
@Meryntje wrote:

[quote=“Zeroh, post:2, topic:276559”]Okay got to your packet handler folder look for Equipment open that you will see something like this

private String[] hats = {“Hooded cloak”, “helm”,“hood”,“coif”,“Coif”,“hat”,“Runecrafter hat”,“partyhat”,“Hat”,“full helm (t)”,“full helm (g)”,“hat (t)”,“hat (g)”,“cav”,“boater”,“helmet”,“mask”,“Helm of neitiznot”,“Runecrafter hat”,“Powdered”,“powdered”,“Wig”,“wig”,“Tiara”,“tiara”,“Mitre”,“mitre”,“Sleeping”,“sleeping”,“Bunny ears”};

Now just simple add the name of the object you want to be wield able.

Now for scythe

private String[] weapons = {“Runecrafting staff”,“Ivandis”, “Scythe”, “flail”, “Monkey greegree”, “Barb-tail harpoon”, “Flowers”, “Keris”, “Saradomin banner”, “Zamorak banner”, “scimitar”,“longsword”,“sword”,“longbow”,“shortbow”,“dagger”,“mace”,“halberd”,“spear”,“staff”,
“Abyssal whip”,“axe”,“flail”,“crossbow”,“Torags hammers”,“dagger§”,“Scythe”};

Okay just when ever you want something weldable make sure if its Bunny Ears make sure it goes under the hat Section and for Scythe make sure it goes under the Weapons section.

Hope I helped and questions just pm on here I will help you.[/quote]
Thanks ill try to get them working

Another things… maybe a noob question.
Wicht things i need to change to get the server and client working on hamachi ?
i tryed 2 times… but it doesnt work…

Read full topic

item.title: [508]How i get an item working[508]
item.dc:creator: @Zeroh Zeroh
item.description:
@Zeroh wrote:

Okay got to your packet handler folder look for Equipment open that you will see something like this

private String[] hats = {“Hooded cloak”, “helm”,“hood”,“coif”,“Coif”,“hat”,“Runecrafter hat”,“partyhat”,“Hat”,“full helm (t)”,“full helm (g)”,“hat (t)”,“hat (g)”,“cav”,“boater”,“helmet”,“mask”,“Helm of neitiznot”,“Runecrafter hat”,“Powdered”,“powdered”,“Wig”,“wig”,“Tiara”,“tiara”,“Mitre”,“mitre”,“Sleeping”,“sleeping”,“Bunny ears”};

Now just simple add the name of the object you want to be wield able.

Now for scythe

private String[] weapons = {“Runecrafting staff”,“Ivandis”, “Scythe”, “flail”, “Monkey greegree”, “Barb-tail harpoon”, “Flowers”, “Keris”, “Saradomin banner”, “Zamorak banner”, “scimitar”,“longsword”,“sword”,“longbow”,“shortbow”,“dagger”,“mace”,“halberd”,“spear”,“staff”,
“Abyssal whip”,“axe”,“flail”,“crossbow”,“Torags hammers”,“dagger§”,“Scythe”};

Okay just when ever you want something weldable make sure if its Bunny Ears make sure it goes under the hat Section and for Scythe make sure it goes under the Weapons section.

Hope I helped and questions just pm on here I will help you.

Read full topic
